description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              The Finance Assistant is responsible for assisting the Finance and Accounting Manager and company finance and accounting staff in the performance of their duties and to perform specific finance and/or accounting tasks as assigned.
              

              This position reports directly to the Finance and Accounting Manager and is not responsible for supervision of subordinates.
              

              PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES
              
              Duties and responsibilities for this position include but are not limited to the following:
              
              •	Issues and mails outgoing company invoices, credit memos, and adjustments. Prepares and processes incoming invoices and payment vouchers
              
              •	Contacts customers/suppliers to track and secure payments. Reviews customers/suppliers account histories
              
              •	Processes and prepares financial and business forms for the purpose of checking account balances, facilitating purchases, etc.
              
              •	Performs routine calculations to produce analyses and reports as requested by the Finance and Accounting Manager
              
              •	Collects and enters accounting data, assists with accounting reconciliations (in occasional basis)
              
              •	Assists the Finance and Accounting Manager in creating financial reports on a regular basis. Identifies and recommends process improvements as appropriate
              
              •	Checks financial statements and reports, reconciles any discrepancies or errors to ensure all calculations and data entries are correct
              
              •	Performs other duties as assigned.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE AND GENERAL REQUIREMENTS
              
              •	Bachelor degree or equivalent in Finance, Management, Economics, Accounting or Audit.
              
              •	At least 3 years working experience in international financial institutions or foreign-owned companies, in banking or power generation sector is an advantage
              
              •	Possesses excellent communications skills in English (both written and verbal as Conversation business level and able to communicate using basic grammar and vocabularies) and be computer literate
              
              •	Strong Knowledge of Accounting and Economics
              
              •	Good interpersonal, time management, organisational skill and ability to work under high pressure with multi talks.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
